summary: This document is a confidential email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Epstein. It includes discussions about market values of various units held by Euroclear and the need for clarification on values for Euroclear positions. Key individuals involved are from J.P. Morgan and Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Janet E. Young

persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is an Associate at Deutsche Bank, who is coordinating with Janet Young regarding the asset transfer.
